DOC.brief_summary: Intracoronary bolus Abciximab single non-inferior intravenous continuous 12- hour infusion size reduction infarction cardiac magnetic resonance Non-ST elevation Myocardial infarction .
DOC.brief_title: Intracoronary Bolus Only Compared With Intravenous Bolus 12-hours Infusion Abciximab Non-ST Elevation Myocardial Infarction .
DOC.criteria: nonST segment elevation acute myocardial infarction within 48 hour presence chest pain TroponinT I positive CAG First myocardial infarction perform coronary angioplasty 18 year age,80 year older Bleeding tendency History major surgery within 4 week Major stroke within 2 year Thrombocytopenia ( < 120,000 / uL ) Cardiogenic shock Known allergy aspirin , heparin , abciximab Contraindication MRI study entry ( implanted pacemaker , defibrillator , intracranial metallic implant etc ) Chronic atrial fibrillation Pregnancy
